author: keepersway
content: How likely/possible is it for there to be an emergency switch to POS due to miners still wanting to show force?

author: shamuzzlik
content: Anyone can have a proposal and submit it, doesn't mean it will be included.

author: yorickdowne
content:
Keep in mind I am merely a user, not a dev of anything: I find it unlikely. Because of comments made by Micah that an emergency merge is something to do in response to an attack, *not* in response to a threatened attack and not because there is disagreement over a technical change.
As well you have gcolvin adding his 2 cents that merge is 1 to 2 years away.
If "merge then sharding" wins out and some of these "simple merge" ideas win out, I can see a merge within 12 months. That's hardly "break glass" speed though.
